<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The AddrSig section uses a series of relocations to refer to the symbols that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should be considered address-significant. The only interesting content of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// these relocations is their symbol; the type, length etc will be ignored by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the linker. The reason we are not referring to the symbol indices directly is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that those indices will be invalidated by tools that update the symbol table.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Symbol relocations OTOH will have their indices updated by e.g. llvm-strip.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mcmachostreamer-cpp-/mcmachostreamer/#a5b9193e77b26973b0c65a96716330b87"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mcmachostreamer-cpp-/mcmachostreamer/#a5b9193e77b26973b0c65a96716330b87">MCMachOStreamer::createAddrSigSection</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcassembler">MCAssembler</a> &amp;Asm = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectstreamer/#a3e9a3c0090b1184f7371fa5ad4ce57c9">getAssembler</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectwriter">MCObjectWriter</a> &amp;writer = Asm.getWriter();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!writer.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcobjectwriter/#a8cd9936953941196b85a3e2ff1c2abf7">getEmitAddrsigSection</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the AddrSig section and first data fragment here as its layout needs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to be computed immediately after in order for it to be exported correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection">MCSection</a> &#42;AddrSigSection =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Asm.getContext().getObjectFileInfo()-&gt;getAddrSigSection();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mcmachostreamer-cpp-/mcmachostreamer/#afb372de94b1d4298c2bd4518af8e14bd">changeSection</a>(AddrSigSection);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Frag = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;MCDataFragment&gt;</a>(AddrSigSection-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcsection/#ac28ea8ba1e28d8b3a3ca7234e1bc1083">curFragList</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcsection/fraglist/#a3642f400a4586489d672ba4501c486b6">Head</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We will generate a series of pointer-sized symbol relocations at offset</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 0x0. Set the section size to be large enough to contain a single pointer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (instead of emitting a zero-sized section) so these relocations are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// technically valid, even though we don&#39;t expect these relocations to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// actually be applied by the linker.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Frag-&gt;appendContents(8, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
